title: Entities
subtitle: Explore organizations in our ecosystem

search.label: Search entities
search.placeholder: Enter organization name, industry, or location...

addMyEntityDescription: Add your entity to the platform and manage it easily. Upgrade to Member to access full platform features.
upgradeDescription: To add entities and access full platform features, upgrade your account to Member status.
introDescription: Browse companies, startups, and institutions in our ecosystem. Sign in to see full profiles and contact details.
upgradeToMemberToCreateEntities: Upgrade to Member to Create Entities
subscriberUpgradeMessage: As a subscriber, you can view entities but need to upgrade to member status to create your own.
externalWebsiteWarning: You are about to visit an external website. Please be cautious and verify the authenticity of the site.

types.technologyCenterDesc: Research centers, innovation hubs, tech parks

verification.officialDesc: Only submit information about entities you officially represent
verification.accurateDesc: Update contact information and details as they change
verification.completeDesc: Fill out all fields for better visibility and credibility
verification.uniqueDesc: Create separate submissions for different entities

status.needHelp: Need help? Contact our support team
status.noOpportunitiesDescription: This entity doesn't have any open opportunities at the moment.
status.noProductsDescription: This entity doesn't have any products listed at the moment.
status.contactDescription: Get in touch with this entity
status.quickMessageDescription: Send a direct message to start a conversation
status.contactFormDescription: Send a detailed inquiry with your contact information
status.visitWebsiteDescription: Explore their website for more information

draft.title: Entity Draft Saved
draft.description: Your entity has been saved as a draft. You can continue editing it anytime before submitting for review.
draft.instruction: Complete all required fields and submit your entity for review when ready.

pending_review.title: Entity Pending Review
pending_review.description: Your entity has been submitted and is awaiting review by our moderation team. We'll notify you once the review is complete.

published.title: Entity Published!
published.description: Your entity has been successfully published and is now visible to other users on the platform.

failed.title: Entity Creation Failed
failed.description: We couldn't create your entity due to a technical issue. Please try again or contact support for assistance.

rejected.title: Entity Rejected
rejected.description: Your entity submission was rejected during the review process. Please review the feedback and make necessary corrections.

pending.title: Verification Pending
pending.description: Your entity verification request has been submitted. Our team will review the provided documentation shortly.

under_review.title: Under Verification Review
under_review.description: Our verification team is currently reviewing your entity's documentation and credentials. This process typically takes 2-5 business days.

verified.title: Entity Verified!
verified.description: Your entity has been successfully verified. It now displays a verification badge and has access to premium features.

rejected.title: Verification Rejected
rejected.description: Your entity verification was rejected due to insufficient or invalid documentation. Please review the requirements and resubmit.

expired.title: Verification Expired
expired.description: Your entity verification has expired. Please submit updated documentation to maintain your verified status.

pending.title: Approval Pending
pending.description: Your entity is pending administrative approval. This additional review ensures compliance with our platform standards.

approved.title: Entity Approved!
approved.description: Your entity has been approved by our administrative team and is now fully active on the platform.

rejected.title: Approval Rejected
rejected.description: Your entity was not approved during the administrative review. Please review the feedback and address any issues.

needs_revision.title: Revision Required
needs_revision.description: Your entity requires revisions before it can be approved. Please review the feedback and make the necessary changes.

scheduled.title: Publication Scheduled
scheduled.description: Your entity is scheduled for publication. It will become visible to users at the specified time.
scheduled.scheduleInfo: Your entity will be automatically published according to the schedule.

published.title: Entity Published!
published.description: Your entity is now live and visible to all platform users. It can be found in search results and directory listings.

failed.title: Publication Failed
failed.description: We encountered an error while publishing your entity. Please try again or contact support for assistance.

unpublished.title: Entity Unpublished
unpublished.description: Your entity has been unpublished and is no longer visible to other users. You can republish it anytime from your dashboard.

archived.title: Entity Archived
archived.description: Your entity has been archived and moved to storage. It's no longer active but can be restored if needed.

fieldTips.name: Use your official company or organization name
fieldTips.description: Describe what your organization does, its mission, and unique value
fieldTips.website: Your official website URL for credibility and contact
fieldTips.logo: High-quality logo helps users recognize your brand
fieldTips.tags: Add relevant keywords for better discoverability

fieldGuideDescription: Tips for filling out each field correctly
chooseTypeDescription: Select the category that best describes your organization
verificationDescription: Ensure your entity submission meets our standards

visibility.publicDesc: Visible to all Ring platform users

entityHelpDescription: Get help with creating and managing your entity profile.
name: Name
